snippet.title: Breaking: Windows Blue will be a free update named Windows 8.1
snippet.description: ...The update to Windows 8 previously codenamed "Blue" will be officially known as "Windows 8.1," and it will be shipping later this year as a free update distributed via the Windows Store. Windows 8.1 was announced by Windows Division CFO Tami Reller today at JP Morgan's Technology, Media, and Telecom Conference in Boston.A public preview of Windows 8.1 will be available on...

snippet.title: Appeals court flushes FCC fine for NYPD Blue butt shot
snippet.description: ...The New Year arrives with yet another satisfying rebuke to the Federal Communications Commission's indecency rules. Nearly three years ago, the FCC threw the book at ABC television for a 2003 NYPD Blue episode in which actress Charlotte Ross's derriere was visible for a number of seconds. For this offense to the sensibilities of the NYPD Blue audience, the Commission fined 44 ABC affili...
